title: Final Takeaways From the 2018 Regular Season | The Ringer NFL Show (Ep. 374)
description:
The Vikings close out a disappointing season with a loss to Chicago, the Eagles continue to ride the Nick Foles wave, and the talented Steelers miss the playoffs (00:30). Plus, stock up on the Chiefs and Colts, stock down on the Jaguars and coaches soon to be fired, and challenge flags on the Bears and Cowboys refusing to lose (28:00). 
Hosts: Robert Mays and Kevin Clark

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
